content: My PR for consolidating the gitignore files is not merging because my commit is not gpg signed. I'm not sure what the next steps are to fix this. I didn't find much online on how to sign an old commit, and rebase -i just shows noop.
I've used git rebase --exec 'git commit --amend --no-edit -n -S' -i HEAD~3 in the past
Yup, found the same solution. Had to also setup my first GPG key.
